verses.text_plain: And Rehoboam went to Shechem: for all Israel were come to Shechem to make him king.
verses.verse_html: 1And Rehoboam went to Shechem: for all Israel were come to Shechem to make him king.

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who was yet in Egypt, heard of it, (for he was fled from the presence of king Solomon, and Jeroboam dwelt in Egypt;)
verses.verse_html: 2And it came to pass, when Jeroboam the son of Nebat, who was yet in Egypt, heard of it, (for he was fled from the presence of king Solomon, and Jeroboam dwelt in Egypt;)

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when Jeroboam

verses.text_plain: That they sent and called him. And Jeroboam and all the congregation of Israel came, and spake unto Rehoboam, saying,
verses.verse_html: 3That they sent and called him. And Jeroboam and all the congregation of Israel came, and spake unto Rehoboam, saying,

verses.text_plain: Thy father made our yoke grievous: now therefore make thou the grievous service of thy father, and his heavy yoke which he put upon us, lighter, and we will serve thee.
verses.verse_html: 4Thy father made our yoke grievous: now therefore make thou the grievous service of thy father, and his heavy yoke which he put upon us, lighter, and we will serve thee.

tokens.text: now therefore make thou the grievous

verses.text_plain: And he said unto them, Depart yet for three days, then come again to me. And the people departed.
verses.verse_html: 5And he said unto them, Depart yet for three days, then come again to me. And the people departed.

verses.text_plain: And king Rehoboam consulted with the old men, that stood before Solomon his father while he yet lived, and said, How do ye advise that I may answer this people?
verses.verse_html: 6And king Rehoboam consulted with the old men, that stood before Solomon his father while he yet lived, and said, How do ye advise that I may answer this people?

verses.text_plain: And they spake unto him, saying, If thou wilt be a servant unto this people this day, and wilt serve them, and answer them, and speak good words to them, then they will be thy servants for ever.
verses.verse_html: 7And they spake unto him, saying, If thou wilt be a servant unto this people this day, and wilt serve them, and answer them, and speak good words to them, then they will be thy servants for ever.

tokens.text: If thou wilt be a servant
to them, then they will be thy servants

verses.text_plain: But he forsook the counsel of the old men, which they had given him, and consulted with the young men that were grown up with him, and which stood before him:
verses.verse_html: 8But he forsook the counsel of the old men, which they had given him, and consulted with the young men that were grown up with him, and which stood before him:

verses.text_plain: And he said unto them, What counsel give ye that we may answer this people, who have spoken to me, saying, Make the yoke which thy father did put upon us lighter?
verses.verse_html: 9And he said unto them, What counsel give ye that we may answer this people, who have spoken to me, saying, Make the yoke which thy father did put upon us lighter?

verses.text_plain: And the young men that were grown up with him spake unto him, saying, Thus shalt thou speak unto this people that spake unto thee, saying, Thy father made our yoke heavy, but make thou it lighter unto us; thus shalt thou say unto them, My little finger shall be thicker than my fathers loins.
verses.verse_html: 10And the young men that were grown up with him spake unto him, saying, Thus shalt thou speak unto this people that spake unto thee, saying, Thy father made our yoke heavy, but make thou it lighter unto us; thus shalt thou say unto them, My little finger shall be thicker than my fathers loins.

tokens.text: unto us; thus shalt thou say

verses.text_plain: And now whereas my father did lade you with a heavy yoke, I will add to your yoke: my father hath chastised you with whips, but I will chastise you with scorpions.
verses.verse_html: 11And now whereas my father did lade you with a heavy yoke, I will add to your yoke: my father hath chastised you with whips, but I will chastise you with scorpions.

verses.text_plain: So Jeroboam and all the people came to Rehoboam the third day, as the king had appointed, saying, Come to me again the third day.
verses.verse_html: 12So Jeroboam and all the people came to Rehoboam the third day, as the king had appointed, saying, Come to me again the third day.

verses.text_plain: And the king answered the people roughly, and forsook the old mens counsel that they gave him;
verses.verse_html:
13And the king answered the people roughly, and forsook the old mens counsel that they gave him;
 roughly: Heb. hardly

verses.text_plain: And spake to them after the counsel of the young men, saying, My father made your yoke heavy, and I will add to your yoke: my father also chastised you with whips, but I will chastise you with scorpions.
verses.verse_html: 14And spake to them after the counsel of the young men, saying, My father made your yoke heavy, and I will add to your yoke: my father also chastised you with whips, but I will chastise you with scorpions.

verses.text_plain: Wherefore the king hearkened not unto the people; for the cause was from the Lord, that he might perform his saying, which the Lord spake by Ahijah the Shilonite unto Jeroboam the son of Nebat.
verses.verse_html: 15Wherefore the king hearkened not unto the people; for the cause was from the Lord, that he might perform his saying, which the Lord spake by Ahijah the Shilonite unto Jeroboam the son of Nebat.

verses.text_plain: So when all Israel saw that the king hearkened not unto them, the people answered the king, saying, What portion have we in David? neither have we inheritance in the son of Jesse: to your tents, O Israel: now see to thine own house, David. So Israel departed unto their tents.
verses.verse_html: 16So when all Israel saw that the king hearkened not unto them, the people answered the king, saying, What portion have we in David? neither have we inheritance in the son of Jesse: to your tents, O Israel: now see to thine own house, David. So Israel departed unto their tents.

verses.text_plain: But as for the children of Israel which dwelt in the cities of Judah, Rehoboam reigned over them.
verses.verse_html: 17But as for the children of Israel which dwelt in the cities of Judah, Rehoboam reigned over them.

verses.text_plain: Then king Rehoboam sent Adoram, who was over the tribute; and all Israel stoned him with stones, that he died. Therefore king Rehoboam made speed to get him up to his chariot, to flee to Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html:
18Then king Rehoboam sent Adoram, who was over the tribute; and all Israel stoned him with stones, that he died. Therefore king Rehoboam made speed to get him up to his chariot, to flee to Jerusalem.
 made: Heb. strengthened himself

footnotes.body_html: made: Heb. strengthened himself

verses.text_plain: So Israel rebelled against the house of David unto this day.
verses.verse_html:
19So Israel rebelled against the house of David unto this day.
 rebelled: or, fell away

footnotes.body_html: rebelled: or, fell away

verses.text_plain: And it came to pass, when all Israel heard that Jeroboam was come again, that they sent and called him unto the congregation, and made him king over all Israel: there was none that followed the house of David, but the tribe of Judah only.
verses.verse_html: 20And it came to pass, when all Israel heard that Jeroboam was come again, that they sent and called him unto the congregation, and made him king over all Israel: there was none that followed the house of David, but the tribe of Judah only.

tokens.text: And it came to pass, when all Israel

verses.text_plain: And when Rehoboam was come to Jerusalem, he assembled all the house of Judah, with the tribe of Benjamin, an hundred and fourscore thousand chosen men, which were warriors, to fight against the house of Israel, to bring the kingdom again to Rehoboam the son of Solomon.
verses.verse_html: 21And when Rehoboam was come to Jerusalem, he assembled all the house of Judah, with the tribe of Benjamin, an hundred and fourscore thousand chosen men, which were warriors, to fight against the house of Israel, to bring the kingdom again to Rehoboam the son of Solomon.

verses.text_plain: But the word of God came unto Shemaiah the man of God, saying,
verses.verse_html: 22But the word of God came unto Shemaiah the man of God, saying,

verses.text_plain: Speak unto Rehoboam, the son of Solomon, king of Judah, and unto all the house of Judah and Benjamin, and to the remnant of the people, saying,
verses.verse_html: 23Speak unto Rehoboam, the son of Solomon, king of Judah, and unto all the house of Judah and Benjamin, and to the remnant of the people, saying,

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord, Ye shall not go up, nor fight against your brethren the children of Israel: return every man to his house; for this thing is from me. They hearkened therefore to the word of the Lord, and returned to depart, according to the word of the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 24Thus saith the Lord, Ye shall not go up, nor fight against your brethren the children of Israel: return every man to his house; for this thing is from me. They hearkened therefore to the word of the Lord, and returned to depart, according to the word of the Lord.

verses.text_plain: Then Jeroboam built Shechem in mount Ephraim, and dwelt therein; and went out from thence, and built Penuel.
verses.verse_html: 25Then Jeroboam built Shechem in mount Ephraim, and dwelt therein; and went out from thence, and built Penuel.

verses.text_plain: And Jeroboam said in his heart, Now shall the kingdom return to the house of David:
verses.verse_html: 26And Jeroboam said in his heart, Now shall the kingdom return to the house of David:

verses.text_plain: If this people go up to do sacrifice in the house of the Lord at Jerusalem, then shall the heart of this people turn again unto their lord, even unto Rehoboam king of Judah, and they shall kill me, and go again to Rehoboam king of Judah.
verses.verse_html: 27If this people go up to do sacrifice in the house of the Lord at Jerusalem, then shall the heart of this people turn again unto their lord, even unto Rehoboam king of Judah, and they shall kill me, and go again to Rehoboam king of Judah.

verses.text_plain: Whereupon the king took counsel, and made two calves of gold, and said unto them, It is too much for you to go up to Jerusalem: behold thy gods, O Israel, which brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.
verses.verse_html: 28Whereupon the king took counsel, and made two calves of gold, and said unto them, It is too much for you to go up to Jerusalem: behold thy gods, O Israel, which brought thee up out of the land of Egypt.

tokens.text: unto them, It is too much

verses.text_plain: And he set the one in Bethel, and the other put he in Dan.
verses.verse_html: 29And he set the one in Bethel, and the other put he in Dan.

verses.text_plain: And this thing became a sin: for the people went to worship before the one, even unto Dan.
verses.verse_html: 30And this thing became a sin: for the people went to worship before the one, even unto Dan.

verses.text_plain: And he made an house of high places, and made priests of the lowest of the people, which were not of the sons of Levi.
verses.verse_html: 31And he made an house of high places, and made priests of the lowest of the people, which were not of the sons of Levi.

tokens.text: which were not of the sons

verses.text_plain: And Jeroboam ordained a feast in the eighth month, on the fifteenth day of the month, like unto the feast that is in Judah, and he offered upon the altar. So did he in Bethel, sacrificing unto the calves that he had made: and he placed in Bethel the priests of the high places which he had made.
verses.verse_html:
32And Jeroboam ordained a feast in the eighth month, on the fifteenth day of the month, like unto the feast that is in Judah, and he offered upon the altar. So did he in Bethel, sacrificing unto the calves that he had made: and he placed in Bethel the priests of the high places which he had made.
 offered: or, went up to the altar, etc
 ,
 sacrificing: or, to sacrifice

footnotes.body_text: offered: or, went up to the altar, etc
footnotes.body_html: offered: or, went up to the altar, etc
sacrificing: or, to sacrifice

verses.text_plain: So he offered upon the altar which he had made in Bethel the fifteenth day of the eighth month, even in the month which he had devised of his own heart; and ordained a feast unto the children of Israel: and he offered upon the altar, and burnt incense.
verses.verse_html:
33So he offered upon the altar which he had made in Bethel the fifteenth day of the eighth month, even in the month which he had devised of his own heart; and ordained a feast unto the children of Israel: and he offered upon the altar, and burnt incense.
 offered: or, went up to the altar, etc
 ,
 and burnt: Heb. to burn incense

footnotes.body_text: offered: or, went up to the altar, etc
footnotes.body_html: offered: or, went up to the altar, etc

footnotes.body_text: and burnt: Heb. to burn incense
footnotes.body_html: and burnt: Heb. to burn incense
